name: ContentVersion
description: Represents a specific version of a Salesforce CRM Content document or Salesforce file.
summary:
The `ContentVersion` object in Salesforce represents a specific version of a content document, such as a file or document stored in Salesforce. Here is a summary of its key attributes:

- **Id**: Unique identifier for the content version.
- **ContentDocumentId**: Reference to the parent content document.
- **IsLatest**: Boolean indicating if this is the latest version of the document.
- **ContentUrl**: URL to access the content.
- **ContentBodyId**: Reference to the content body.
- **VersionNumber**: String representing the version number.
- **Title**: Title of the content version.
- **Description**: Text area for describing the content.
- **ReasonForChange**: Reason for the change in this version.
- **SharingOption**: Picklist for sharing options.
- **SharingPrivacy**: Picklist for sharing privacy settings.
- **PathOnClient**: Path of the file on the client's system.
- **RatingCount**: Number of ratings received.
- **IsDeleted**: Boolean indicating if the content version is deleted.
- **ContentModifiedDate**: Date and time when the content was last modified.
- **ContentModifiedById**: Reference to the user who last modified the content.
- **PositiveRatingCount**: Number of positive ratings.
- **NegativeRatingCount**: Number of negative ratings.
- **FeaturedContentBoost**: Boost value for featured content.
- **FeaturedContentDate**: Date when the content was featured.
- **OwnerId**: Reference to the owner of the content version.
- **CreatedById**: Reference to the user who created the content version.
- **CreatedDate**: Date and time when the content version was created.
- **LastModifiedById**: Reference to the user who last modified the content version.
- **LastModifiedDate**: Date and time when the content version was last modified.
- **SystemModstamp**: System timestamp for the last modification.
- **TagCsv**: Comma-separated values of tags associated with the content.
- **FileType**: Type of the file.
- **PublishStatus**: Picklist for the publish status of the content.
- **VersionData**: Base64 encoded data of the content.
- **ContentSize**: Size of the content in bytes.
- **FileExtension**: Extension of the file.
- **FirstPublishLocationId**: Reference to the first publish location.
- **Origin**: Picklist for the origin of the content.
- **ContentLocation**: Picklist for the location of the content.
- **TextPreview**: Text preview of the content.
- **ExternalDocumentInfo1**: Additional information about the external document.
- **ExternalDocumentInfo2**: Additional information about the external document.
- **ExternalDataSourceId**: Reference to the external data source.
- **Checksum**: Checksum value for the content.
- **IsMajorVersion**: Boolean indicating if this is a major version.
- **IsAssetEnabled**: Boolean indicating if the content is asset-enabled.

These attributes collectively provide detailed information about the content version, including its metadata, versioning details, and associated user actions.
label: Content Version
